segments.text: Hi , Mary , I have decided to look for a job as a salesman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good ! Have you got the recruitment information on marketing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have found some through different channels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . The first piece of job information I got was from the Internet , and it is about selling medicines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of this job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not familiar with the medicine industry , and I don't think it fits me well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Another is about electronic commerce , and its products are mainly large machinery equipments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have heard about electronic commerce , and many people say it has good prospects for development .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also feel it's nice . I want to give it a try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on ! I believe you will succeed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . You can also seek job information on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . I will think it over .
segments.speaker: S2
